sections.title: CamSoda Onboarding
bullets: Turn on CamSoda fast-track verification inside Creator Studio
Record a 30-second intro clip for the featured carousel
Enable text-to-tip to let whales snipe goals mid-show

sections.title: CamSoda Promo Stack
bullets: Schedule two FanClub drops per week to surface in push notifications
Join weekday Takeovers at least once per month for front-page exposure
Tag streams with trending kinks plus two evergreen categories
